history.content: I need a hotel in central Amsterdam for 3 nights next month, under 150 euros per night, with good reviews and reliable Wi-Fi. What would you recommend?

Based on your criteria, I would suggest staying at The Modern Hideaway. It is centrally located, offers room service, a terrace, a garden, and free biliards, which seems to meet your preferences. Additionally, it has good reviews regarding Wi-Fi reliability.
Do you think the Hotel Renaissance Amsterdam Central also meets my criteria?

The Hotel Renaissance Amsterdam Central is another great choice. It's centrally located, offers room service, a terrace, a garden, and free WiFi, all of which align with your requirements. It also has positive reviews about Wi-Fi reliability.
Do you have any other specific preferences or considerations?

If you're looking for more amenities, consider staying at The Modern Hideaway. It offers a gym, family rooms, air conditioning, breakfast included, and a terrace/garden. These additional perks might appeal to you.
Thank you, that was very helpful. That's all I needed, goodbye.
